Summary: Large burning ball flying through sky, eventually stopping, floating, then slowly moving until vanishing.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in West Palm Beach
There were no other sightings in West Palm Beach on or around March 6th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down a local road in my town w\ two friends, when me and the passenger in my car saw a large ball shaped object flying througth atmosphere, and it appeared to have an extremely long tail behind it (sparks, fire). as we pulled into a local plaza we noticed that the ball lost its firey tail and had started to hover motionless in the sky. then suddenly it started moving and within a matter of 30 seconds the object and lights vanished in thin air. i am an avid ufo follower and this was my first real life sighting. i can garuntee that this was not a conventional aircraft.
